This script is for flipping those variants that doesen't have the same Effect Allele coding as their corresponding exposure counterpart. 

```{r}
PDcolnames<-c("MarkerName","Allele1","Allele2","Effect","StdErr","P.value","NStudies","HetISq")
pathData<-c("/data/neurogen/MRandPD/Results/HarmonizationVerbose/data4Harmonizing/SNPsinPD4Flipping/")
FileNames<-list.files(path = pathData, pattern = NULL)
ldf <- lapply(FileNames, read.table, col.names=PDcolnames)
FileNames <- sub("inPD4flip","", FileNames)
names(ldf) <- FileNames
ageofinit<-ldf$ageofinit
ageofinit<-tbl_df(ageofinit)
ageofinit[,2:3]<- ageofinit[,3:2]
ageofinit[,4]<- ageofinit[,4]*-1
write.table(ageofinit,"/data/neurogen/MRandPD/Results/HarmonizationVerbose/data4Harmonizing/AllHarmonized/ageofinitPDfliped")
cigarettespday<-ldf$cigarettespday
cigarettespday<-tbl_df(cigarettespday)
cigarettespday[,2:3]<- cigarettespday[,3:2]
cigarettespday[,4]<- cigarettespday[,4]*-1
write.table(cigarettespday,"/data/neurogen/MRandPD/Results/HarmonizationVerbose/data4Harmonizing/AllHarmonized/cigarettespdayPDfliped")

drinksperweek<-tbl_df(drinksperweek)

eversmoking<-ldf$eversmoking
```
